title: Heavy script on Tópas Icelandic candy packaging
content:
Looking for a font id for this candy packaging from Iceland known as Topas. Any help with any of the letters would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705162054im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/-3_5657.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [-3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705162054/http:/typophile.com/files/-3.jpg) | 45.45 KB |

 [‹ (x) Lula Mag display face - Kursivschrift {Michael A}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705162054/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40310 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pangea Organics logo rounded tech sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705162054/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41973 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content: That is beautiful hand lettering. You might like [FF Tartine](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705162054/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_tartine_script_ot_bold/) or [Coquette](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705162054/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/mark_simonson/coquette_bold/).
I would like to add [Radio](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705162054/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Radio/) to the list...
